data.description:
Pickleball is the fastest growing sport in the USA and this is its top simulator. Experience cutting dinks, outrageous rallies and pickup games with AI Bots and friends around the world.
State-of-the-art configurable custom physics, makes VR Pickleball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life forehand, backhand, and volley moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way. 
This app includes:
- Configurable AI Bots for Singles and Doubles, Stationary Ball machine, Moving Ball machine, Practice Wall and several drills
-  Pro pack includes Padel, Racquetball, Cricket, Badminton, etc.
- Competitive multiplayer against real players from around the world.
-Several Ball types, Paddle types, Court types and Avatars
- Ambidextrous play
-Customizable physics: Arcade, Simcade and Simulation modes 
-Customizable paddle size, paddle sensitivity, paddle friction, ball bounce, ball friction, etc.
-Support for paddle grip adapters.
-Instant Replay with playback trail
-Instant Analytics
-Configurable options like displaying fault trajectory on the fly, ball landing position, ball trail, collision animation, ball orb, background tracks etc.
- A variety of immersive environments to explore.
-Mixed reality
- In-game leaderboard where you can compete to be a star. 
- Fully localized in following 27 languages with text and audio

Tech support contacts:
Facebook -https://www.facebook.com/groups/vrpickleball/
Discord - https://discord.gg/gHZCUSPuRE
Email - viniotstudios@gmail.com

changelog.change_log: Improve peer to peer data transfer efficiency in multiplayer
Update net collider
Bugfix regression in picking up the ball with right hand for left handed play during serve.
Update preset for SolidSlime adapter for Quest 2 for better alignment.
Bugfix Paddleball daily leaderboard score wasn't getting updated correctly sometimes.
Raise lift assistance back based on user feedback. Reduce probability of Bot chicken dance based on score. Limit how close the player can go to the net.
Update Paddleball. New music and new scene with great 360 degree view and gameplay.
Update teleport distance calculation when smart volley is on. Increase camera culling max distance.
Use HDR green field skybox
Add Green Field scene. Bug fix leaderboard for NYC Handball
Bugfix wall practice. Increase paddle sensitivity in handball. Update default partner bot avatar.
Add NYC Handball. Bugfix joystick not working with non-Meta Avatars.
Improved performance and physics. Reduced lift assistance by 50% to make the game more realistic. Increase the lift assistance slider if you want more assistance.
Update review rewards and commentary
Update menu fonts and layout. Improve leaderboard performance.
Update audio comments
Bugfix full body bot walking animations
Bugfix bot hitting volley on serve return
Add badminton (Experimental) which is unlocked for Pro and some reviewers. Made swapping paddle hand faster in ambidextrous mode.
Update default
